Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that a Pakistan national flag was waved at an Indian National Congress party rally when the video clearly shows a different flag.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the flag in the video represents the Indian Union Muslim League (IUML) political party, not Pakistan.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading Facebook post and does not provide any substantial evidence to prove that a Pakistan flag was actually waved at the rally.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the presence of a different flag at a Congress rally indicates a cultural issue within the party.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the flag in the video represents the IUML political party, which was an ally of the Indian National Congress party during the 2018 Karnataka state elections.
